text:
I have been working on setting up Lenya with Eclipse and while the documentation provided in the tutorial got me started, there are a number of items that are not currently called out in the tutorial.

Specifically, you also need to change the build.sh or build.bat (depending you your environment) to reflect the correct location of your cocoon src, per the recommended directory structure on the site. (ENDORSED_DIR="externals/cocoon_2_1_x/lib/endorsed" in build.bat and "set COCOON_HOME=externals\cocoon_2_1_x" in build.sh.  We/You/Someone might also look at bringing the two files in-line with each other (more consistency) with regard to variables and structure).

There are a few other nits that probably need some work.

As I have recently waded through this, it is pretty fresh in my mind and I could take a stab at updating the documentation.  Let me know if I have a green light, as I don't want to duplicate effort if anyone else is already working on this task.
creator: lance@lancehendrix.com
